column4: Can someone help me with making this symlink? "The system can be configured to allow bitmap fonts by replacing the symlink /etc/fonts/conf.d/70-no-bitmaps.conf with a symlink /etc/fonts.conf.d/70-yes-bitmaps.conf -> ../conf.avail/yes-bitmaps.conf"
how do i replace a symlink though?
delete the existing link.   Then create the new one.
